function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on wastewater surveillance to estimate COVID-19 presence and prevalence.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to incorrect public health response.","Mitigation":"Combine wastewater surveillance with clinical testing for accurate assessment.","Technologies":"Wastewater surveillance technology, clinical testing technology.","People":"Public health officials, community members.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions."}]}
